product_description: The Modular Pet Patio Door by Ideal can be inserted onto the tracts of your aluminum sliding patio door to create a pet door without damaging your current patio door. This item comes as two, easy to connect modules that are designed to fit standard sliding aluminum patio doors. This patio door insert is constructed of white finish aluminum and clear tempered safety glass. Just insert the Modular Pet Patio Door into your aluminum sliding patio door frame against the side it closes on, and pull your door up against it to close it with the new addition. This patio door has an animal lock-out slider to allow you to lock the pet door at your discretion.

short_description: No-Cut DIY Install: The PetSafe Sliding Glass Pet Door installs easily into your sliding glass door track, perfect for apartments or rentals with no drilling or permanent alterations required

Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: The PetSafe Sliding Glass Pet Door is the ideal apartment-friendly pet access solution for renters, condo owners, and anyone seeking an easy no-cut DIY install. This compact sliding pet panel comes in one piece and fits directly into your existing sliding glass door track, offering quick fit patio access without drilling or permanent alterations. Made from weatherproof aluminum and featuring shatter-resistant tempered glass, this temporary patio insert is built to withstand the elements while maintaining your home’s energy efficiency. The sealed magnetic entry flap ensures a secure, weather-resistant seal, while the snap-in closing panel and built-in human door locking system provide added access control. With adjustable height options to fit your specific patio door rails, and a flap opening, this wide entry dog flap system supports hands-free movement inside and out for your dog or cat. Whether you're looking for a permanent fixture or a renter-friendly addition to a sliding patio door, the PetSafe Sliding Glass Pet Door delivers reliable, customizable access for your pet without compromising your space. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.
